2B0FEE3B.Line7.C1CD3: To get the answers you seek, you must offer payment. A head for knowledge.

340DCDE7.VoiceDir9.C1CD0: Reference to the heads thinking Player and team can help them track down Elias, the character who betrayed the Tree of Whispers.

911B74B6.Line5.C1CD0: An old drunk, the judge of what is real? (laughter) We are real, and so is the law of the swamp.
